Functions
IsDegenerate
static bool IsDegenerate(
CGeomVertex* v0,
CGeomVertex* v1,
CGeomVertex* v2
)

Determines if the specified triangle is degenerate (i.e. area == 0)

Parameters
v0
CGeomVertex*

Position of vertex 1

v1
CGeomVertex*

Position of vertex 2

v2
CGeomVertex*

Position of vertex 3

Returns

True if triangle is degenerate. False otherwise.

IRenderer* pRenderer,
std::vector<CGeomVertex> &verts,
IShaderInfo* pShaderInfo,
std::vector<int>& vertexReferenced,
MeshData* pMeshData
)

Creates a vertex buffer using the specified vertex list.

Parameters

IRenderer*

Graphics device

verts
std::vector<CGeomVertex>&

list of vertices

pShaderInfo
IShaderInfo*

Information about the shader

vertexReferenced
std::vector<int>&

List indicating which vertices were referenced by the face list

MeshData

place to store created vertex buffer

BuildReferencedVertexList
static void BuildReferencedVertexList(
std::vector<CGeomFace> &faces,
std::vector<CGeomVertex> &verts,
std::vector<int>& vertexReferenced
)

Determines which vertices are part of non-degenerate faces. This function is used to prune out degenerate faces when building the vertex/index buffers.

Parameters
faces
std::vector<CGeomFace>&

list of faces

verts
std::vector<CGeomVertex>&

list of vertices

vertexReferenced
std::vector<int>&

List indicating which vertices were referenced by the face list

CreateDepthGridMesh

IRenderer* pRenderer,
uint32 width,
uint32 height,

)

Creates a render submesh that is a grid. This is used for rendering a depth map as a mesh.

height
